channel.title: Comments on: Maybe it should be called “AsleepFall”
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: Yeah, what a big disappointment Dreamfall was. Cruddy tacked-on combat and stealth mechanics, characters whose reappearance in the sequel seemed pointless -- and count yourself lucky you didn't finish. You got to miss the ten-minute non-interactive ending complete with about a dozen plot threads left unresolved. Talk about an unfinished game.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, what a big disappointment Dreamfall was. Cruddy tacked-on combat and stealth mechanics, characters whose reappearance in the sequel seemed pointless — and count yourself lucky you didn’t finish. You got to miss the ten-minute non-interactive ending complete with about a dozen plot threads left unresolved. Talk about an unfinished game.
